name: Into The Deep (BirdBrain Studios)
description:
Into The Deep is a game made for the Ludum Dare 48 Game Jam in 36hours - The theme was deeper and deeper.

Into The Deep is a game where you need to collect treasure at the bottom of the ocean in your submarine without disturbing the fish and getting shouted at by your boss. Oh, and don't get fired …

CONTROLS:

F - Full-Screen toggle

WASD / Arrow Keys to move
